description:
Akari, Aika and Alice are scheduled for a full day of training with Akira, and what`s more, two customers will be along for the ride.  They`re a couple on their honeymoon; but while the wife loves Undines and riding on gondolas, the husband thinks being an Undine is simple work, and couldn`t really care less about the whole thing.  It`s up to Akira to teach everyone what it means to be an Undine ñ Undines-in-training included!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: その 素敵なお仕事を...
